title: Honey and Marmalade Sour Recipe

2
ounces
vodka

freshly squeezed juice
from
1
whole
lemon
1

honey syrup
(see note)
1
teaspoon
orange marmalade
Directions
Combine vodka, lemon, marmalade, and honey syrup in cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into chilled coupe glass.
Notes
To make honey syrup, combine 1 cup water with 1 cup honey in a small saucepan and heat over medium heat, stirring constantly, until sugar is dissolved. Cool before using. Honey syrup will keep in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker, strainer
Vodka
